title: Already have riot kayle, what mystery skin do i get?
body: I already have riot kayle so what skin do I get? I just the the icon and went looking for a new skin but found nothing.

replies.body: All the gifts are still being sent out and individually.  If you haven't gotten yours yet, just hang tight!  Stay updated at our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-) and wait up until everything is done.  Let me know if you have any questions.

It's possible that you have not received it yet, as the gifts are not distributed all at the same time to the same account.

Also, you can view your gifting history by going toe the store and clicking on **_Account > Purchase History > Gifting History_**. If you received a gift from Riot, it should show up there. If it doesn't, then you likely haven't gotten the mystery skin yet.
